keywordhandler.add.usage: Usage: !keyword add [flags] [keyword] [response]. Flags can by empty or any combination of "--regex", "--case-sensitive".
keywordhandler.cooldown.usage: Usage: !keyword cooldown [keyword] [seconds] - Use -1 to remove a cooldown.
keywordhandler.cooldown.removed: Cooldown for keyword $1 has been removed.
keywordhandler.cooldown.set: Cooldown for keyword $1 has been set to $2 seconds.
